subtitle: A delicious variation on a a classic.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Grease a 1 litre ovenproof dish.
Put a layer of bread into the oven dish.
Top with half the blackcurrants and half the sugar.
Top with remaining blackcurrants and sugar.
Finish with a layer of bread.
Beat the milk and eggs together. Strain and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 10 min.
Bake for about 35 min or until just set and pale golden brown.

title: Blackcurrant bread and butter pudding
